price: (45) But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you;[1271] perhaps you will receive mercy..."[1272]
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُواْ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
footnotes:
[1271]- Of sins or of life in this world and the Hereafter.
[1272]- The conclusion of this sentence is understood to be "...they ignored the warning."
